attributes.action: Force supermarkets to accept any returned packaging with a recyclable logo on it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every week we are FORCED to throw away product packaging that says "recyclable" because supermarkets and local councils will/can not take it. 

For example: yoghurt pots, drink cartons, fruit punnets and many other plastics.

If manufacturers insist on using "fake" recyclable materials they (or those who sell the goods) should pick up the cost of dealing with them.
